beautiful: It is very beautiful, isn't it?
The border [of the garment] is very beautiful.

दिव्य: गृहस्य वामतः एव सर्वाणि पुष्पसस्यानि आरोपयाम | तदेव सुन्दरं भविष्यति
divya: gRhasya vAmataH eva sarvANi puSpasasyAni AropayAma | tadeva sundaraM bhaviSyati
beautiful: Let us plant all the flowering plants on the left-side of the house. That only will be beautiful.
